summary:
Beautiful tone of shadow (Sky Lighting and SSAO). 
Not vivit color.
Not too darker shadow.
Not too darker night.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21818-1-1344273845.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21818-2-1344261322.gif[/img]

Work in progress.
-------------------------------------------
Features
-------------------------------------------
Beautiful tone of shadow. (Sky Lighting and SSAO)
Not vivit color.
Not too darker shadow.
Not too darker night.
Bluish Bloom effect.

Everything is a matter of personal taste. 
Adjust it yourself.

-------------------------------------------
Installation
-------------------------------------------
1. Download and extract my mod into your skyrim  main folder (the folder with the TESV.exe. it should be something like this \\\\\\\"C:\\\\\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\\\\\Steam\\\\\\\\steamapps\\\\\\\\common\\\\\\\\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\\\\\\\")

2. Download \\\\\\\"ENBSeries v0.114 beta for TES Skyrim\\\\\\\" from  http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0114.htm and extract \\\\\\\"d3d9.dll\\\\\\\" from the download to your skyrim main folder (same place as step 1)

3. Go into you skyrim prefs ini its in my documents (C:\\\\\\\\Users\\\\\\\\USER\\\\\\\\Documents\\\\\\\\My Games\\\\\\\\Skyrim\\\\\\\\SKYRIMPREFS.INI) and change these under the \\\\\\\"[Display]\\\\\\\" )
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1 (required for \\\\\\\"Sky Lighting\\\\\\\")
bDrawLandShadows=1 (required for \\\\\\\"Sky Lighting\\\\\\\")
bShadowsOnGrass=1 (required for \\\\\\\"Sky Lighting\\\\\\\")

4. (Optional) Check on NoViblack ENB Darker Dungeons&Interiors.esp. It is more darker Dungeons and Interiors.

5. I recommend setting your in-game brightness to center.

-------------------------------------------
Recommend MOD
-------------------------------------------

ENB SSAO and DoF Toggler for Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13306


-------------------------------------------
Known Issues/Bugs
-------------------------------------------
- ENB Series bright water surface bug.
- ENB Series SSAO transparency bug.

-------------------------------------------
Log
-------------------------------------------
2012 08.06 1.0 Release.
2012 08.07 1.1 Add NoViblack ENB Darker Dungeons&Interiors.esp. More bluish in the night.

-------------------------------------------
Credits
-------------------------------------------
Boris Vorontsov: ENB Series
Matso : Modify enbprepass.fx
HeliosDoubleSix : Modify enbeffect.fx
author: tktk
